original_title: CZW: Zandig's Ultraviolent Tournament of Death
overview: August 31, 2002 saw the first annual CZW Tournament of Death. The event was billed as Zandig's Ultraviolent Tournament of Death due to a storyline of John Zandig losing ownership of CZW to Lobo, thus promoting his own deathmatch tournament. It was held in Dover, Delaware.
title: CZW: Zandig's Ultraviolent Tournament of Death
